subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|[[𪴥]]<!-- 𬃏 is a Japanese character -->, [[𬎞]], [[軉]] <!-- 𨉗 is a historical variant found in Kangxi dictionary -->, [[𨰰]]<!-- 𫒭 is used for names in Taiwan -->, [[𫘄]], [[䴐]], [[𩇉]]<!-- 𮦚 is a Korean character -->, [[𦈆]]}}

subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*pəw||price}}; cognate with {{cog|my|အဖိုး||price}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}; STEDT). {{zh-ref|Peiros and Starostin (1996)}} also compares it to {{cog|bo|སྤུས|t=goods}}. {{zh-ref|Sagart (1999)}} relates it to {{och-l|富|rich}}. {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} proposes that it could be the same word as {{och-l|保|to take care of; to consider something precious}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[treasure]]; [[riches]]; [[valuable]]s; [[precious]] thing
# to [[treasure]]; to [[cherish]]
# to [[collect]] (treasures)
# [[treasured]]; [[cherished]]
# [[precious]]; [[valuable]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[jade]] [[token]]
# {{n-g|term of respect, for things related to the [[emperor]], to [[Buddhism]], to [[Taoism]], or to other people}}
# {{lb|zh|term of endearment}} [[darling]]; [[baby]]; [[dear]]
# {{lb|zh|gambling}} a kind of [[gambling]] [[device]]
